content.rendered:
[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1578075332829{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_id=”first-row”][vc_column]

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
SOLAR

Ground screw solutions for solar

A stable foundation for power generation projects around the world, American Ground Screw solutions effectively anchor solar arrays without concrete footings. Our system of screws, connectors and hardware is adaptable to any terrain and compatible with all static and tracking photovoltaic systems. Install secure footings in minutes instead of days while minimizing the environmental footprint of your project.

Learn More
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row fullwidth=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1578326411677{background: #f7f9fa url(http://ags.petsupplymfg.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/about-header.fw_.png?id=9555) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column]
[vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1578260887262{margin-right: 140px !important;margin-left: 140px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Cost-Effective

Save on materials and labor with no digging or concrete needed

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Customized

We can design and manufacture systems according to your needs

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1578262566673{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column]
[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
CONSTRUCTION

Ground screw solutions for construction

Our professional-grade ground screw systems create reliable foundations for a wide variety of light industrial projects, from anchoring wooden structures to fencing, footbridges and storage containers. Quick to assemble without the need for concrete footings or excavation, our solution dramatically reduces your labor and materials costs while minimizing environmental impact.

APPLICATIONS

Temporary Structures

Pavilions

Bridges & Footbridges

Fencing

Advertising Spaces

Office Containers

Carports

Learn More
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row parallax=”content-moving” fullwidth=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1578326276984{background: #f7f9fa url(http://ags.petsupplymfg.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/applications-construction-bg.jpg?id=9926);background-position: center;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column]
[vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1578260887262{margin-right: 140px !important;margin-left: 140px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Easy

A stable foundation ready in in a fraction of the time

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Sustainable

Systems designed to minimize waste and environmental impact

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1578262566673{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column]
[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
HOUSEHOLD

Ground screw systems for the consumer market.

Our easy-to-use and affordable ground screw systems are ideal for  do-it-yourself home improvement, including light construction and recreational projects like umbrellas and sports netting. There are no concrete footings needed, so it’s easy to remove or relocate foundations later with minimal effort or wear and tear.

Learn More
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row column_inner_spacing=”30″ column_inner_padding=”” column_inner_mobipadding=””][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]
